query: What is Deloitte, and what are their main offerings and focus areas?

results.title: Deloitte SWOT Analysis : Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats
results.content: Deloitte stands as a prominent figure in the professional services network, renowned for its broad array of offerings in audit, consulting, financial advisory, risk management, and tax services. Founded in 1845 by William Welch Deloitte in London, this firm has evolved significantly throughout its company history, establishing a strong market

results.title: What We Do | Deloitte
results.content: We provide audit and assurance, consulting, tax and related services, but we're more than our offerings. We exist to make an impact that matters. Whether we're focusing on equality, serving the public interest or leading the digital transformation, we're committed to growing opportunity for people and societies around the world.Working alongside our clients, we help them realize their

results.title: Our Purpose & Values | Deloitte
results.content: At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters. It leads us to focus on accelerating equity, sustainability and shared prosperity through all that we do: because that's the type of affect that matters to us and for our clients, our people and our communities.

results.title: About Consulting services | Deloitte US - Deloitte United States
results.content: Deloitte refers to one or more of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited, a UK private company limited by guarantee ("DTTL"), its network of member firms, and their related entities. DTTL and each of its member firms are legally separate and independent entities. DTTL (also referred to as "Deloitte Global") does not provide services to clients.
